block.p: While a film's box-office take during its first weekend doesn't guarantee a huge gross, it helps to open with a bang. Each of the top 10 films, with the exception of ''X-Men'' and ''Lost World,'' attracted more than $300 million, after adjusting for inflation.

''Spider-Man 3,'' above, opens on Friday, and it will probably join this list. But it will have a long way to go to top ''Spider-Man,'' which earned an inflation-adjusted $461 million, not to mention ''Titanic'' (1997), at $769 million, and ''Star Wars'' (1977), at $1.6 billion.
